snippet: Dow Chemical will cut about 3 percent of its global work force as it prepares to break off a significant part of its chlorine operations in a deal announced this year with Olin.
abstract: Dow Chemical will cut about 3 percent of its global work force as it gets ready to cut off large part of its chlorine operations in deal announced with Olin.
lead_paragraph: Dow Chemical will cut about 3 percent of its global work force as it prepares to break off a significant part of its chlorine operations in a deal announced this year with Olin.

headline.main: Dow Chemical to Cut Jobs, Under Hedge Fund Pressure
headline.print_headline: Dow Chemical to Cut Jobs, Under Hedge Fund Pressure
